channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Kiri and Lou
channel.desc: Super Sticky Situation. Lou wakes up to find himself on a lily pad in the middle of the lake. He freaks out at first, but his Calm Inner Voice comes to the rescue.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Maddie & Triggs
channel.desc: McGinty's Farm. Maddie and Triggs visit McGinty's farm to hear his world-famous animal orchestra.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Bluey
channel.desc: Horsey Ride. When Bluey forgets to put her favourite toy away, cousin Socks grabs it and won't let go.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Hey Duggee
channel.desc: The Space Badge. Animated preschool series. The Squirrels wonder what Duggee is up to, he seems to be looking through a long stick out of the window. What's that, Duggee.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: I Can Do It, You Can Too
channel.desc: Yoga and Sack Race. Ila learns the yoga tree pose with coach Parnika, while James races against Aaron in a fun sack race challenge.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Let's Go for a Walk
channel.desc: Ten-Mile Snake and Willow Tree Walk. Ranger Hamza and the Ramblers stomp like giants and find a ten-mile-long snake on a walk to play a train game.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Our Family
channel.desc: Meet Amanpreet's Family. Amanpreet and her family visit a safari park and join in with a rhino mud bath.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Big Cook Little Cook
channel.desc: Ferdinand the Frog Prince. Jen and Small cook up a delicious froggy fruit salad for Ferdinand the Frog.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Biff and Chip
channel.desc: The Last Balloon. Have Biff and Chip gone too far when they and their friends become knights in shining armour in order to protect their last balloon from bursting.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: What's in Your Bag?
channel.desc: Yoga Instructor. Yoga instructor Finlay tells us all about how important breathing is in yoga and how his brilliant ball helps him to do it well.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild
channel.desc: Spectacled Bear and Tiger. Aneeshwar and Lizzie meet two amazing animals and reveal a surprising connection between them in the wild. This time, it's the spectacled bear and the tiger.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Grace's Amazing Machines
channel.desc: Pedal Machines. Series for young children that celebrates many different kinds of amazing machines. In this episode, Grace shows off three incredible machines that are Pedal powered.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Yakka Dee!
channel.desc: Grass. Dee encourages a friend to say 'grass', and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see green, spiky and hairy grass, and Dee finds some fairy grass.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Numberblocks
channel.desc: Heist. Can Sixteen to Twenty use their special skills to sneak past the robot guards at the Museum of Numbers.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Alphablocks
channel.desc: How Now Brown Cow. Educational fun. The Alphablocks meet their match when Brown Cow and her singing friends Owl, Howl and Growl take the stage.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Wonderblocks
channel.desc: Magic Beans. Go and Stop are given some magic beans and discover that they can make amazingly shaped plants. But which ones look the best.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Colourblocks
channel.desc: Green. Green arrives, bringing her natural colour to Colourland. Learn about the colour green.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Hey Duggee
channel.desc: The Teddy Bear Badge. Animated preschool series. Duggee and the Squirrels take their teddy bears on a picnic, where they meet a real bear who wants a teddy too so she can join in.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Yukee
channel.desc: Water Music. Sonny organises a tea party in his caravan to show off his new musical instrument, but rain comes pouring through the leaky roof. Are his plans for a musical afternoon a washout.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Something Special
channel.desc: Back in Time. Justin and his friends step back in time, and Mr Tumble has some clock trouble.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Teletubbies
channel.desc: Toast. Preschool series. The Teletubbies eat lots of tubby toast and make a huge pile of crumbs. Luckily, the Noo-noo is on hand to clean up.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Vida the Vet
channel.desc: Tidbit's Buggy Bite. Tidbit gets a mosquito bite on picture day, and he doesn't want a photo. Vida has an idea.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Mojo Swoptops
channel.desc: Dewey Dragon. Preston is in costume as everyone's favourite character, Dewey Dragon, but he isn't ready for how demanding Dewey's fans are. Mojo and Bo need to help him escape the crowd.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Waffle the Wonder Dog
channel.desc: Waffle Make and Do. Doug helps Waffle make new neighbour Pepper a dog bed. They fondly remember when Mrs Hobbs adopted Pepper and when they made their first box-bed for her cat, George.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Maddie's Do You Know?
channel.desc: Popcorn and Pasta. Maddie explores some favourite foods. She visits a pasta factory to see how flour is mixed with water and turned into pasta dough.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Octonauts
channel.desc: The Jellyfish Bloom. Animated deep sea adventures with Captain Barnacles and his explorers. Shellington gets trapped in the middle of a massive jellyfish bloom.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Vida the Vet
channel.desc: Sunny's Naptime Blues. Sunny has trouble sleeping at the clinic. Vida gathers all his comforts of home to help.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club
channel.desc: Ladybird's Game Show. Spot the odd one out or guess who lives here. A great memory tip from Duggee, an edition of The Agony and Eggstacy, and how to draw Enid - down to her last whisker.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Peter Rabbit
channel.desc: The Tale of the Lying Fox. Animated series. When Mr Tod is trapped in Mr McGregor's garden, Peter reluctantly agrees to help him escape.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Andy's Prehistoric Adventures
channel.desc: Gigantoraptor and Feather. Preschool adventure series. Andy travels back 85 million years to meet a giant feathered dinosaur that is as tall as a house.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Mojo Swoptops
channel.desc: Cheesy Bang Bang. The cheese delivery race is on as Mojo and the racer top try to deliver food faster than Filo. But the competition gets too hot when an explosive souffle is on the table.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Bluey
channel.desc: Mini Bluey. Dad whinges that Bluey and Bingo are too different, so Bluey plans to make them more alike.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Bluey
channel.desc: Bad Mood. Bingo is stomping around the house with Dad causing chaos, but can Bluey get her to stop.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Supertato
channel.desc: Carrot the Champion. Evil Pea captures Supertato, but Carrot finally masters the ultimate flip kick and rescues her.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Big Lizard
channel.desc: The Night of the Slug. Big Lizard and Cosima undertake an exciting night-time mission rehoming a friendly slug that's taken residence in Cosima's bedroom.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: GiggleQuiz
channel.desc: Super Banana Gail. In order to win the quiz, Gail becomes a superhero like her teammate Captain Adorable.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Waffle the Wonder Dog
channel.desc: Waffle's Great Escape. Mrs Hobbs is looking after Waffle, but he tries to escape to join Evie at school.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Puffin Rock
channel.desc: A Special Seashell. Baba is sick, so Oona tries to cheer him up with a special, shiny seashell.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: JoJo & Gran Gran
channel.desc: It's Time to Open a Shop. After visiting Jared's shop, JoJo and Gran Gran set up their own shop at home - if you pay with panda pounds, you can buy anything and everything.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Moon and Me
channel.desc: Who Is Hiding? Inside the little Toy House, Moon Baby is playing a hiding game with his friends. In Storyland, everybody plays hiding in different places. But who is hiding where.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Clangers
channel.desc: Catch a Falling Star. Nothing is going right for any of the Clangers today, until a strange star passes by.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: In the Night Garden
channel.desc: Hiding in Flowerpots. Series for young children. The Pontipines set off for a walk around the garden. Mr and Mrs Pontipine lose the children. Which flowerpot are they hiding in.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: CBeebies Bedtime Stories
channel.desc: Kate Winslet - Grumpycorn. Kate Winslet tells the story of a unicorn whose search for inspiration leaves him with a bad case of the grumps.
